summary: Energetic priest Don Camillo returns to the town of Brescello for more political and personal duels with Communist mayor Peppone.
cast: Fernandel|Gino Cervi|Arturo Bragaglia|Édouard Delmont|Alexandre Rignault|Saro Urzì|Thomy Bourdelle|Claudy Chapeland|Leda Gloria|Tony Jacquot|Lia Di Leo|Marco Tulli|Enzo Staiola|Miranda Campa|Charles Vissières|Paolo Stoppa|Emilio Cigoli|Jean Debucourt|Checco Durante|Pina Gallini|Manuel Gary|André Hildebrand|Robert Lombard|Jean Mollier|Rina Morelli|Giovanni Onorato|Gian Paolo Rosmino|Ruggero Ruggeri|Bernardo Severoni|Lino Solari|Beppe Tosi|Gloria Villar
title: Le retour de Don Camillo
